Stats

Biography

2023: Did not see game action.

2022: Played in five games for the Skyhawks…Helped team to OVC Championship…Saw game action against Boise State (Sept. 17), Lindenwood (Sept. 24), Tennessee Tech (Oct. 1), Murray State (Oct. 8) and No. 3 Tennessee (Oct. 22).

BEFORE UTM: Joins the Skyhawks from Pittsburgh where he spent two seasons but did not see game action with the Panthers during the 2020 or 2021 seasons...Prepped at Miami Southridge Senior where he played for head coach Sedrick Irvin, Sr....Tallied 50 tackles, 8.5 sacks, three forced fumbles, two fumble recoveries and a pair of defensive touchdowns as a senior...Helped Southridge to a 9-3 record and a berth in the Florida High School Athletic Association (FHSAA) Class 8A playoffs - the state's largest classification...Ranked as a three-star prospect by 247Sports.com...Ranked as a three-star prospect by Rivals.

PERSONAL: Born on July 8, 2001...Step-son of Thomas Mobley and the son of the late Macketta Belgrave...His guardian is Philip Simpson...Has three siblings, Thomas Jr., Philip Jr. and Nicholas...Majoring in criminal justice.
